Html:
Hello,

Has anyone seen this type of functionality done with Prism WPF applications?

I would like to implement the drag-detach-tab-move-another-screen ala Google Chrome.

Any pointers/tips would be appreciated.

Hi,

As far as I know there is no official guidance about dragging and dropping views or regions in Prism as out of the box. However, I believe you might find useful information related to this kind of functionality in the following links:

  • Drag & Drop in MVVM
  • How to: Drag and Drop WPF Views between Regions in Prism-v2

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
